item.title: Hilton Brussels City
item.body: This design hotel boasts wellness facilities including a sauna and hammam, opposite Rogier Metro Station. Hilton is 250 metres from the Rue Neuve shopping area and includes a bar serving Belgian wines and beers.

item.title: Silken Berlaymont Brussels
item.body: This design hotel is set in the business district, a less than a 5-minute walk from the European Commission.

item.title: Thon Hotel Brussels City Centre
item.body:
Set a 3-minute walk from the Rogier Square and the trendy Rue Neuve Street with its many shops and restaurants, Thon Brussels City Centre offers unique views from its top-floor relaxation centre with a fitness room and a sauna.
All rooms at Thon Brussels City Centre have air conditioning, coffee and tea making facilities, and a small fridge with a free bottle of mineral water. Guests can make unlimited use of computers and enjoy free internet access in the hotel's business centre.
Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet in the Cap Nord restaurant. The O Bar bar and lounge offers a large choice of Belgian beers. Here, you can opt for a game of billiards or watch a programme on the flat-screen TV.
The City2 Shopping Mall is a 2-minute walk from the hotel. The Rogier metro station is a 3 minutes' walk away and is only 1 stop away from the Brussels North Station, from where guests can get to Brussels Airport in just 12 minutes. The Grand-Place is a 15-minute walk away.

item.title: Novotel Brussels Centre Tour Noire
item.body: We are situated in the centre of Brussels. It is built around the historical Tour Noire (Black Tower) on the Sint Katelijne square. This characteristic and trendy city district is known for its excellent gastronomy, its picturesque fish market and the presence of several antiquaries and tasteful decoration shops. Even in winter you will love this area with its ice skating court and merry-go-rounds. During the summer you can visit one of the Jazz bars or festivals. This stylish neighborhood is situated at only 500 meters from the Grote Markt or Main Square of the city. The Novotel Brussels has 217 renovated rooms on offer, including executive rooms and rooms adapted to people with a disability. Each room is nicely decorated and has a shower or bath, toilet, hairdryer, individual air-conditioning, mini-bar, “coffee & tea facilities”, flat screen television, telephone with direct outside access, Personal Computer modem connection, multi-media plugs and a safe. In our rooms, as well as in all our public areas and meeting rooms WI-FI is available. In our breakfast lounge you will find our buffet with an assortment of bread, cold cuts, fruit and cereals. In our trendy Bar & Brasserie Foodsquare, with terrace, we propose you a choice of tasty meals and beers. You can enjoy one of our à la carte dishes or you can choose one of our suggestions. If you prefer having your meals in your room, room service is available at all times. Our conference centre has 11 meeting rooms on offer, including a large room of 215 square meters; an excellent accommodation for plenary sessions. Most of our meeting rooms are adaptable following your wishes. You will find in our foyer a coffee corner where you will find coffee, tea, fruit juices and biscuits. Our Business Service Centre is a suited for business meetings as well as parties or personalized happenings. To add to an agreeable stay, we invite you to enjoy the sports- and relaxation facilities in our Aqua Health Centre. Apart from a fullyequipped fitness room, you will also find a jet stream pool, hammam, infrared showers and relax area in there. Changing rooms, showers and towels are at your disposal.

item.title: Chelton Hotel
item.body: Chelton Hotel features 50 spacious rooms recently renovated (April 2013). The Hotel offers all the necessary comfort for a pleasant stay in Brussels. Whether you are on business trip or in city trip with your family or friends, you will always find at Chelton hotel a room that suits your needs.

item.title: ibis Brussels Centre Gare du Midi
item.body: The Ibis Brussels Centre Gare du Midi hotel is located opposite of the Gare du Midi train station, where you can catch the Thalys, Eurostar and ICE, and just 1.2 miles (2 km) from the Grand-Place de Bruxelles. In addition to its 225 spacious and air-conditioned rooms, the hotel proposes a 24-hour bar, two meeting rooms, Wi-Fi Internet access and ADSL. This hotel is ideally located if you wish to discover Brussels or to relax between your connections at the Gare du Midi.

item.title: Hotel BLOOM
item.body:
Concept
In 2007, Hotel BLOOM! renewed the hotel and invited 287 creative young artists from different European countries to paint the rooms of the hotel and make it something unique for the guests. Now guests have the luxury to choose their own favourite room with a hand painted fresco on the wall by their own interpretation of the word ‘bloom'.
The hotel is located near the botanical gardens. With lots of flowers, plants, trees and herbs blossom the whole year. “To bloom” means “to open”, “to grow or to flourish” what totally echoes the building of the hotel.
Overall, at BLOOM! You'll find no stuck up rules. Forget dress codes, room service or bell boys. We attract people that have an open mind. Because we do things differently!
Practical
305 rooms in 7 different types SmoodS - Living Room, Kitchen and Music (see www.smoods.net) 12 colourful meeting rooms OO! Restaurant for our WOOW Breakfast Buffet and group meals Free state-of-the-art fitness on the top floor We offer 2 bottles of mineral water per room, feel free to fill the minibar with your own favorite drinks. The hotel does not provide room service but you can buy a tasty snack in our Grab & Go-corner at the reception. Free WIFI in the entire hotel Botanique concert halls just next door. Discounts on concerts, exhibitions as a hotel BLOOM! guest. Our interactive TV system allows you to listen to your own music, play Angry Birds, read our dining suggestions, and lots more! You can also use features of the system on your iPad, iPhone and laptop.
Fitness in BLOOM!
Enjoy our state-of-the art fitness on the 8th floor of the hotel, with a great view on Brussels. Everything for your cardio or muscular workout is present as well as free towels, fruit and water.

item.title: Sofitel Brussels Le Louise
item.body: The luxurious Sofitel Le Louise is around the corner from Avenue Louise, 100 metres from the Louise Metro Station. It features modern design rooms and a large outdoor terrace.

item.title: The Hotel Brussels
item.body: The Hotel. welcomes all business sophisticates looking for the best place to stay in Brussels. The Hotel. is a cosmopolitan, central spot to work, relax and spend the night in style. Covering all contemporary travelling needs, this address of sophistication offers a balanced mix of elegance and punch, timelessness and fashion. The Hotel. attaches great value to functional comfort and honest, relaxed luxury. Every space in this iconic sixties landmark offers fantastic skyline views. Emphasis on comfort and style. All 421 rooms and suites are full of light and use space cleverly. They come with excellent kingsize beds, a flatscreen TV, a private bathroom with rainshower, luxury amenities, free WiFi, proper plugs and connections. Extra special is their fashionable touch (books and magazines), reflecting the area's energy. Professional gatherings for up to 400 can make use of one of the 12 rooms on the 1st, 25th, 26th and 27th floors. Practically speaking, each meeting room can be configured boardroom, classroom or theatre-style but it's the elegant and minimalist interiors and the inspiring 180° city views that encourage visionary thinking. Stylish yet entirely functional thanks to free and unlimited high-speed wireless Internet, broadband access, video conferencing capabilities, multiple telephone lines, LCD projectors and built-in screens, electric black-out stores plus good old-fashioned flip charts and white boards. For a very exclusive private event, cocktail, dinner party, VISTA 27, on the 27th floor is probably the exceptional and desired venue in Brussels to find. With the 94 m height and located on the highest part of Brussels nowhere else you can have an inspiring meeting or event with such great views.

item.title: The Dominican
item.body: This boutique hotel is located a 5-minute walk from Grand Place. It offers spacious accommodation and guests can make use of the spa with its sauna and Turkish steam bath.

item.title: Hotel Be Manos
item.body: The Be Manos Hotel, ideally located next to the Thalys and Eurostar Terminal, is the first Design Boutique Luxury Hotel in Brussels. The Hotel, with its 60 Rooms and Junior Suites decorated in Black and White with natural black stone floors, metallic curtains, joyful photographs laid in aluminum, terraces with a panoramic view and gastronomicRestaurant Be Lella are a mixture of esthetics, luxury and a timeless design.

item.title: Aloft Brussels Schuman by Starwood
item.body: Aloft Schuman offers loft-style rooms with a 42” flat-screen TV. It features a gym, free Wi-Fi and is situated only 550 metres from Schuman Metro Station

item.title: Park Inn by Radisson Brussels Midi
item.body: Park Inn Brussels Midi combines modern rooms, a fitness room and a restaurant & grill with an ideal location opposite Brussels-South Railway Station. The Eurostar and Thalys high-speed train terminals are only 200 metres away. Flat-screen cable TV, air conditioning and tea and coffee making facilities are provided in the rooms at Park Inn by Radisson Brussels Midi. They also feature a work desk and a modern bathroom with a bath or shower. The Manneken Pis Statue is less than a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Park Inn by Radisson is 1.5 km from the Palais de Justice. Gare Du Midi Metro Station is only 100 metres away. At the in-house RBG Bar & Grill, guests can enjoy signature dishes such as succulent steaks and gourmet burgers. Mixed drinks, local Belgian beers and New York-style cocktail are served at the bar.

item.title: Novotel Brussels Midi
item.body: Cascade Midi offers sound-proofed rooms with modern décor and flat-screen satellite TV, opposite Brussels-Midi Railway Station.

item.title: Thon Hotel EU
item.body:
Thon Hotel EU is a four star hotel, offering 24 hours a day a high quality service. The hotel has 405 comfortable, modern and functional rooms which are decorated in light colors. Thon Hotel EU also combines technology with comfort, to make your stay even better. For easy check-in and check-out, you can use our check-in terminals in the reception area.
Free wireless internet access is available throughout the hotel if you book your stay from our website. Guest PCs with free internet access are also available in the reception area.
The restaurant The Twelve, which is named after the twelve stars in the EU flag, is open every week day for lunch and dinner. When the weather allows, lunch and dinner can be enjoyed at our large outdoor terrace. Unwind at lunchtime or in the evening and enjoy a glass of wine and a delicious meal prepared with fresh, local ingredients. The bar is open every evening.
The hotel has 10 conference rooms with all the technical equipment you would expect from a modern conference hotel. We also offer facilities for video conferences.
Our Duplex Fitness Centre boasts the very latest in high-tech fitness equipment. The centre is open throughout the day for our guests, and is also suitable for beginners.
In the main corridor at the ground floor of Thon Hotel EU, the Thon Passage mall offers a variety of shops to enhance your stay.

item.title: Hotel Pullman Brussels Midi
item.body: The first Pullman Belgium vibrates in the heart of Brussels Midi Station, located 2 steps from the banks of Thalys, TGV and Eurostar. New upscale address, and cosmopolitan design and cutting-edge technologies for hyperconnectées travelers. The head of Victor Bar & Restaurant, Michael Bastin, offers a Franco-Italian menu that fills everyone.

item.title: MEININGER Hotel Brussels City Center
item.body: On the banks of the Charleroi-Brussels canal in an old factory, design hotel Meininger offers free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour front desk. Each modern room is decorated with light grey colored walls and a parquet floor. A flat-screen TV and private bathroom with shower are featured as well in the room. The restaurant and bar are decorated in the style of the factory with large white pillars, the original concrete ceiling and metal factory lamps above the tables.

item.title: 9Hotel Central Brussels
item.body: Located in the museum district, halfway between the Place Royale and the Grand Place, 50 meters away from the Cathedral, the 9HOTEL CENTRAL is ideally situated for working or staying in Brussels. Behind a typical Belgian architecture, you will discover the work of CASTEL VECIANA ARQUITECTURA studio in Barcelona, a cozy atmosphere with design objects as well as antiques, wood and exposed brick walls. 47 spacious and cozy rooms with great architectural views on the nearby buildings giving an impression of a Loft, a musical lounge, a simple, chic and casual elegance, a very nice place to stay in the center of Brussels.

item.title: Hotel La Madeleine
item.body: The hotel La Madeleine** is ideally situated for your stay in Brussels, in the heart of the historic city, close to the central train station and the Grand Square. Behind our 15th century exterior, now an historic monument, we await your visit and welcome you in the traditional charm of Brussels all offered to you at reasonable rates.

item.title: Hotel Le Dome
item.body: Le Dome is right at Place Rogier, opposite the Rogier Metro Station and the City2 Shopping Mall. This renovated hotel offers spacious rooms and free Wi-Fi access in the public areas.

item.title: Astrid Centre Hotel
item.body:
Welcome home ! Situated in the centre of Brussels, Hotel Astrid is 10 minutes' walk away from the Gare Centrale and public transport (tram, bus, metro). This makes it very easy for you to get to the heart of the European quarter or to the Atomium. Just leave Hotel Astrid to find your happiness, whatever it may be: a nice little café or a Michelin starred restaurant, trendy bars and old bistros, Belgian beers, exhibitions, stately homes and quarters. Even if you're on a tight schedule, you'll have time to see all the sights that can't be missed: our Grand Place, so beautiful it will take your breath away (+/- 750m away), Manneken Pis (+/- 900m), Brussels' most international "Kets" and the superb Galeries Royales Saint-Hubert (+/- 700m away). Just a few steps away there is also the museum quarter and the Sablon, a square full of trendy bars, exclusive boutiques and experts in everything from chocolate to antiques. 100 rooms. No-Smoker rooms. Air-conditioning. LED flat screen TV. Safe. Free internet in the lobby. Centrally located. Metro, bus and train within walking distance of the hotel. A few steps from the Grand Place and the shopping streets.
Parking.

item.title: Hotel Le Plaza
item.body: The luxurious Le Plaza boasts a French-style façade and offers spacious rooms next to the City2 Shopping Mall.

item.title: Hotel Queen Anne
item.body:
The Queen Anne is a 60-bedroom hotel right in the heart of Brussels, only a few minutes from the famous Grand' Place, and halfway between the De Brouckère and Rogier Metro stations.
Its decor is sober, with a lot of character, and its comfortable beds ensure an excellent night's sleep. The city's main places of interest can be reached on foot from the hotel. The central position of the Queen Anne*** hotel provides easy access to the wonderful restaurants and brasseries of the Ste Catherine quarter – an absolute must – to the shopping centres of Rue Neuve and the many art galleries, cultural centres and theatres of the City. After a few minutes' stroll you are at the typical boutiques and brasseries of the Galeries Royales St Hubert or can enjoy the shop-window displays of the Belgian trendsetting designers in the Antoine Dansaert quarter. The hotel offers fair rates which guarantee excellent value for money. A delicious buffet breakfast is served from 7 a.m. to 10 a.m... The hotel reception desk is open 24/24 hours. Whether for a business trip or a relaxed weekend visiting the capital of Europe, the Queen Anne*** Hotel will be your quality ally in ensuring a successful stay.

item.title: Husa President Park
item.body: Husa President Park is a 10-min drive from Brussels Expo and a 5-minute walk from Metro station Rogier. The hotel has wellness facilities and a large garden.

item.title: First Euroflat Hotel
item.body: In the heart of the European District ! Located in the European Commission district and only at 100m from the Schuman station (metro, bus, trains, airport shuttles), the First Euroflat Hotel welcomes you in the international environment of the European Village. In the classic comfort of its 133 bedrooms, the hotel atmosphere is warm and friendly. The bright and spacious rooms, the generous breakfast and the privileged location of the hotel will place your business trips under the sign of detente. FREE WIFI Hotel

item.title: Thon Hotel Bristol Stephanie
item.body: Stephanie is located on the famous Avenue Louise in Brussels, 600 metres from Louise Metro Station.

item.title: Hotel Saint Nicolas
item.body: Hotel Saint Nicolas is ideally located in the lively heart of Brussels, a 3-minute walk from Grand Place. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and a daily breakfast buffet.

item.title: Aris Grand Place Hotel
item.body:
Welcome home ! Situated in the historic centre of Brussels, Hotel Aris is 5 minutes' walk away from the Gare Centrale and public transport (tram, bus, metro). This makes it very easy for you to get to the heart of the European quarter or to the Atomium. Just leave Hotel Aris to find your happiness, whatever it may be: a nice little café or a Michelin starred restaurant, trendy bars and old bistros, Belgian beers, exhibitions, stately homes and quarters. Even if you're on a tight schedule, you'll have time to see all the sights that can't be missed: our Grand Place, so beautiful it will take your breath away (+/- 100m away), Manneken Pis (+/- 500m), Brussels' most international "Kets" and the superb Galeries Royales Saint-Hubert (+/- 50m away). Just a few steps away there is also the museum quarter and the Sablon, a square full of trendy bars, exclusive boutiques and experts in everything from chocolate to antiques. 55 rooms. No-Smoker rooms. Air-conditioning. LED flat screen TV. Safe. Free internet in the lobby. Centrally located. Metro, bus and train within walking distance of the hotel. A few steps from the Grand Place and the shopping streets.
Public parking at 100 meters.

item.title: Best Western Hotel Royal Centre
item.body: Located 600 metres from both the Madou and Botanique metro stations, Best Western Hotel Royal Centre offers spacious, charming rooms with free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms have a warm interior and are equipped with tea and coffee making facilities. There is a breakfast room where you can enjoy an extensive breakfast buffet in the morning. The Royal Club bar serves a variety of Belgian beers, international drinks and snacks.

item.title: Hotel Metropole
item.body: This Art Deco hotel dating from 1895 is situated in the historical centre of Brussels, a 10-minute walk from Grand-Place and Brussels Central Station. Guests at Hotel Metropole benefit from 6 free minibar drinks. The marble staircases in the lobby lead up to the rooms, which include a TV with internet access. The Metropole Hotel also offers 24-hour room service. The breakfast room has the same layout and design as the Akshardham Temple in Delhi, India. There is also the Bar le 31 and Café Metropoloe. Guests can enjoy French cuisine in the Baroque setting of the award-winning Restaurant L'Alban Chambon. The Metropole also offers valet parking and a fitness centre with exercise equipment including cycles and weights. De Brouckère metro station is right in front of the hotel and offers direct access to the European Commission. Brussels Airport is 12 km away.

item.title: Mercure Brussels Center Louise
item.body: Location/Description In the prestigious area Louise, close to the EEC institutions, at 15 km from Brussels Airport, at only 1.5 km from the South station (Eurostar & Thalys) and within 20 minutes walking distance from the historical centre. Accomodation 201 spacious rooms with individual heating & air-conditioning unit, direct dial phone with speaker function, High Speed Internet Access, Flat 26inch LCD TV, Complimentary Coffee & Tea, Welcome tray, hair dryer and high quality bathroom amenities. Restaurant-Bar “La Papelotte” At the crossroad of passions and senses, enjoy the exquisite and creative cuisine of our Executive chef and his multi cultural team. Activities and leisure In the heart of the capital of Europe, you are within walking distance of the Grand'Place, the Royal Palace and the Modern Arts Museum. Go shopping on the Deluxe Avenue Louise at 200 m. Discover, create and taste Belgian chocolates at the “Zaabär Factory Shop” or participate to cooking lessons at the "Mmmmh!", a culinary shop, at 100 m from the hotel.

item.title: Bedford Hotel & Congress Centre
item.body: Set in the heart of Brussels' historic centre, Bedford Hotel is a boutique hotel located just 450 metres from the Grand-Place. It features a spacious lobby and serves an American breakfast buffet every morning. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

item.title: NH Atlanta
item.body: This hotel benefits from a gym and wellness facilities, only 800 meters from Grand Place. The breakfast room and summer terrace on the 9th floor offer panoramic views over Brussels.

item.title: Crowne Plaza Brussels - Le Palace
item.body: Set 100 metres from the Rue Neuve shopping street, this luxurious and eco-friendly Art-Nouveau hotel offers a fitness centre with a sauna, as well as a tree-shaded terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property. The Crowne Plaza Brussels Le Palace offers rooms including flat-screen cable TV, air conditioning and a fridge. The spacious rooms feature high ceilings and large windows and have free tea and coffee making facilities. The Nouveau Taste restaurant serves Belgian specialities and international meals in a trendy setting. A range of 35 different beers are available in the Deco Verre bar. It features a separate TV room decorated with old photographs of the hotel. It takes a 15-minute walk to Grand-Place and Rogier Metro Station right in front of the hotel. Brussels-North Railway Station is a 5-minute walk away. Public parking is possible in the vicinity of the hotel.

item.title: Hotel Cascade Louise
item.body: Ideally set in the heart of the commercial and economic area of Brussels, the hotel offers an excellent location, well suited to both business and leisure travellers.

item.title: NH Brussels City Centre
item.body: Around the block from Avenue Louise, NH offers air-conditioned rooms with a work desk and modern bathrooms, with a walk-in shower or bath/shower combination. The hotel includes a fitness centre and is 350 metres from Louise Metro Station. Free WiFi is available.

item.title: NH Stephanie
item.body: The NH Stephanie hotel in Brussels is located in the city center, just around the corner from the internationally renowned shops on Avenue Louise. It is also very close to Place Louise, a hub providing bus, tram and metro connections to reach the heart of the historic city and the Midi railway station with its Eurostar and Thallys connections. The Royal Palace and Parc de Bruxelles are just a 15 minute stroll away. Place Poelart with its impressive Law Courts and stunning views over the city is a five minute walk away and also the point of departure for tours around the city. The NH Stephanie hotel is located on a partially pedestrianized street where you will be able to discover attractive bars and restaurant terraces, boutiques and cafes; the hotel is set in a haven of peace right in the middle of bustling Brussels. NH Stephanie has 67 rooms, with 55 spacious standard rooms with city view and 12 large and elegantly furnished superior rooms. The lobby provides a setting where guests can work or relax over a drink, or stop for a light lunch or dinner in the Lobby bar. The NH Stephanie in Brussels can provide paid on-site parking (limited space) for small and normal sized cars and parking spaces at the entrance for larger vehicles. The reception staff will be glad to help you book a restaurant table, organize tickets for concerts, have flowers or chocolates delivered to your room or organize a surprise for someone special.

item.title: Royal Windsor Hotel Grand Place
item.body: Experience upscale style in Brussels, Belgium, a world-class European city where culture, architectural history and international commerce collide. Situated just steps from the famous Grand Place, Royal Windsor Hotel Grand Place is a luxury hotel that offers the perfect blend of inviting charm and modern sophistication. At Royal Windsor Hotel Grand Place, guests can experience it all; luxurious accommodation, attentive service, and premier dining that brings the flavor of Brussels to the palm of your hand.

item.title: NH Grand Place Arenberg
item.body: The NH Grand Place Arenberg hotel in Brussels offers an ideal location in the historical and commercial center of Brussels. The famous Grand Place and the Central Station, with local and international lines, are within a five-minute walk from our hotel. The Parc de Bruxelles (Waranderpark) with the Royal Palace and the museum of Belgium's master of surrealism, Rene Magritte, are just 10 minutes away from the NH Grand Place Arenberg hotel.Enjoy a relaxed, comfortable stay in our 155 guest rooms, which include six junior suites.

item.title: Best Western City Centre
item.body:
Centrally located Hotel at only 15 minutes walking distance from the historic Grand Place, just near the pedestrian shopping Street “Rue Neuve” and all major Sightseeing opportunities. You will find many museums: Old and Modern Arts, Musical instruments, Chocolates and Cocoa, Belgian Centre for Comic Strip Art, Horta (art nouveau), a Beer brewery, etc. Belgians are known for their gourmet taste. You have to taste our fine Belgian beers, excellent chocolates and delicious waffles!
This elegant comfort 3-star Hotel combines a modern setting, personalised service and has all the advantages of a stylish concept while retaining a human scale. Forty-nine Business Rooms, all equipped with today's modern comfort such as free Coffee facilities, and free WiFi access. Elegant Buffet Breakfast Restaurant and 24 hours Lobby Bar. Other facilities include a business centre with full range office support, non-smoking rooms and same day laundry service. Friendly staff service.
Central location, train, metro and bus vicinity (all within 200 meters)

item.title: Rocco Forte Hotel Amigo
item.body: The 5-star Hotel Amigo boasts elegant rooms with designer features, on the corner of Grand Place. It combines modern facilities, a gym and an award-winning restaurant with a picturesque historic setting.

item.title: Best Western Premier Carrefour de l´Europe
item.body: This luxurious hotel is located 2 minutes from Grand Place and Central Station. Restaurants and shops surround the hotel and the Bourse metro station is a short walk away.

item.title: ibis Brussels Centre Ste Catherine
item.body: Ste Catherine Ibis offers modern yet simple rooms in the centre of Brussels, only 550 metres from Grand Place. This air-conditioned hotel includes a 24-hour front desk and has a cosy bar with traditional wooden décor.

item.title: Sheraton Brussels Hotel
item.body: Rising high above the Brussels' skyline, the Sheraton Brussels Hotel is a 4-star hotel located in the heart of the Brussels business district. We are a great choice for both business and leisure. Sheraton Brussels Hotel is a short stroll from Brussels' main shopping area (city 2 mall) as well as the prestigious Grand Place. Situated on the Brussels city centre ring, our hotel is at a 5 minute walk away from Brussels North station and benifits from direct metro access (Rogier Metro Station). From the airport it will only take you 25 minutes by taxi. The hotel offers 511 air-conditioned rooms (amongst the largest ones of town) with the famous 'Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed', a fitness centre and a spa with roof-top pool and sun terrace.

item.title: Four Points by Sheraton Brussels
item.body: The Four Points by Sheraton Brussels is located on the edge of the old city, just off the prestigious Avenue Louise, with its luxury shops and near all major attractions of Brussels. 128 spacious and well-appointed guestrooms in a familiar and relaxed atmosphere thanks to our signature Comfort bed.

item.title: ibis Brussels off Grand´Place
item.body: Hotel Ibis Brussels off Grand' Place is only 150 metres from the Grand Place, right in the historic centre of Brussels. From here you can easily walk to the major sights and Brussels central station.

item.title: Stanhope Hotel
item.body: Decorated in an English country style, this 5-star boutique hotel has a 24-hour gym with sauna and solarium. The European parliament can be reached in a 10-minute walk.

item.title: Hotel Capital
item.body: Hotel Capital is 750 metres from the elegant Avenue Louise and offers small but modern bedrooms. During the day, you can always get a drink at the bar.

item.title: Hotel Beau Site
item.body: This hotel offers free Wi-Fi and spacious rooms only 170 metres from the fashionable Avenue Louise. There is a 24-hour reception and a computer with free internet access in the lobby.

item.title: Hotel Des Colonies
item.body: This boutique-style hotel is a 2-minute walk from the shops on Rue Neuve and the City2 Shopping Mall. It offers spacious, sound-proof rooms and a 24-hour reception.The renovated rooms of Hotel Des Colonies have interactive satellite TV with 40 channels and a work desk. A breakfast buffet is available daily in the light breakfast room.Guests can relax in the warmly decorated lobby of Des Colonies, a free Wi-Fi connection is provided throughout the hotel. There is a free internet computer as well. Drinks are available in the bar or from the vending machines.Des Colonies Hotel is situated opposite the Rogier Metro Station. Grand Place and the Brussels North Station are a 10-minute walk away.A shuttle limousine is at your disposal for all your city excursions, airport and train station transfers, as well as for your specific site seeing requests.

item.title: Hotel Le Châtelain
item.body: This luxurious 5-star hotel is 50 metres from the Avenue Louise shopping area and features a peaceful garden courtyard and grapevine shaded terrace.

item.title: Novotel Brussels Off Grand Place
item.body: Novotel Brussels Off Grand Place is one of the hotels in Brussels, which is within walking distance of the grand Place, of the historic Market Square. Our hotel is close to the famous Manneken Pis, the historic center and the Royal St. Hubert shopping arcade. Enjoying one of the many restaurants in the Beenhouwersstraat or discovering the taste of famous Belgian beers, it's all in the vicinity of Novotel Brussels Off Grand Place.

item.title: Floris Hotel Ustel
item.body: Located 500 metres from the Gare du Midi Station, this unique hotel comprises 4 Art Nouveau townhouses offering rooms with individual character. The spacious terrace overlooks the Japanese garden.

item.title: Beverly Hills Hotel
item.body: The Beverly Hills Hotel is a 2-minute walk from Avenue Louise and Place Stephanie, next to the prestigious Avenue Toison d'Or and offers guest rooms with a private bathroom. Guests have free access to a small fitness room.

item.title: Hotel Du Congres
item.body: Hotel Du Congres offers simply furnished rooms in the centre of Brussels, less than a 5-minute walk from Madou Metro Station and the Botanical Garden, and 8 minutes' walk from Parc. The hotel is located in 4 restored 19th-century townhouses. Free WiFi connection is available in the public areas.

item.title: NH Hotel du Grand Sablon
item.body: NH is situated on the historic Grand Sablon Square, 5 minutes' walk from the Magritte Museum. It features a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi in the reception and restaurant.

item.title: Hotel Villa Royale
item.body: Our hotel, ideally situated in the hearth of Brussels, with easy access by train, metro or car, offers a unique location affording guests the best opportunity to enjoy the cultural entertainment and business life in the city.

item.title: Floris Hotel Avenue
item.body: Floris is a boutique hotel just 5-minutes' walking from Manneken Pis and 200 metres from Anneessens Metro Stop. It features on-site gym facilities and has a 24-hour front desk. Each of the air-conditioned rooms at Floris Hotel Avenue includes a seating area and large windows offering street or patio garden views. A work desk and minibar are also provided. Guests can relax at the spacious lounge at Floris Hotel. The daily breakfast buffet includes warm dishes and pastries. The famous Grand Place square is 800 metres away from the hotel. Brussels-South railway station is 10 minutes on foot.

item.title: Holiday Inn Brussels-Schuman
item.body: Holiday Inn offers sound-proofed rooms in Brussels, less than 350 metres from Schuman Metro Station and The Council of the European Union. It features a 24-hour reception and mini gym.

item.title: Hotel Belmont
item.body: Within walking distance of Brussel's city centre and its many attractions, this hotel offers comfortable rooms for those seeking quiet, yet affordable accommodation in the European Union's capital.Personal service and easy access to public transportation awaits you at Hotel Belmont. While you read a newspaper, the friendly reception staff is happy to take care of your laundry or organise lunch packages.Breakfast is served buffet-style in the light-filled atrium.Check your emails while your money is being exchanged at the front desk. Room service and the possibility to rent a car further ensure a hassle-free stay at Hotel Belmont.

item.title: Floris Hotel Arlequin Grand-Place
item.body: The 3 stars 92 rooms Floris Arlequin Hotel at Grand Place is located in the centre of Brussels just a few steps from Brussels' historic Grand Place. The area surrounding Grand Place Brussels is full of restaurants and boutique shops. The Floris Arlequin Hotel at Grand Place is easily accessible from Central Station or nearby Metro. The Floris Arlequin Hotel in Brussels has nearby public parking. The Floris Arlequin Hotel at Grand Place, Brussels has a trendy lobby that contains a corner bar and reception area. There is also an iMac for personal use available (FREE) and a small fitness room. The 92 air-conditioned rooms of the Floris Arlequin Hotel at Grand Place, Brussels on 7 floors, overlook the sites of central Brussels. Some command great views of the Gothic Grand Place. The central Brussels hotel has Standard and Executive rooms, as well as some triple rooms for families. Breakfast is taken in the delightful 7th floor panoramic room with views over the city and Grand' Place.

item.title: Warwick Barsey Hotel
item.body: Warwick Barsey Hotel, in the Avenue Louise area, is only 100 metres from the Abbaye Tram Stop. It features neoclassical inspired designer décor, a music lounge and a fitness centre.

item.title: Le Meridien Brussels
item.body: Le Meridien Bruxelles is set opposite Brussels Central Station, a 5-minute walk from Grand Place. Most of the spacious rooms have city views. The guest rooms are warmly decorated with soft colours and furnishings.

item.title: Pentahotels
item.body: Ideally located for visiting Brussels Expo, this 3-star hotel is surrounded by green scenery and has easy access to the main motorways.

item.title: Progress Hotel
item.body:
The Progress Boutique Hotel offers a perfect balance of comfort and personal service combined with upscale amenities and central location in Brussels.
This harmonious approach to our guests' pleasure is further enhanced by our devotion to creating an atmosphere of intimacy, aesthetics and relaxation in our spacious public areas.
Personal service and devotion by our staff to your comfort and convenience is a key factor to our hospitality approach. Business and recreation travelers enjoy true hospitality in one of Brussels very few boutique hotels.
The Progress is a newly constructed city hotel, offering 57 deluxe double non-smoking rooms and suites,fully airconditioned and with all imaginable state-of-the-art comfort in rooms and public spaces alike.
Hotel Highlights
Boutique style business hotel with personal service and care Spacious Rooms and Suites Free wifi throughout hotel Non-Smoking Brussels Hotel No Pets Allowed City center Brussels location - Minutes away from shopping area, museums, entertainment, business and financial districts, close to all major public transports. Full hotel facilities: Concierge services, fitness center, internet corner and wi-fi, limousine service, relaxing massage chairs Full conference and meeting facilities

item.title: Citadines Sainte Catherine Brussels
item.body: At 50 metres from the Saint Catherine Metro Station, the Citadines Apart'hotel offers studios and apartments with free internet. Guests have direct metro access to the Schuman district.

item.title: Citadines Toison d’Or Brussels
item.body: Citadines Toison D'or offers rooms and self-catered studios and apartments, next to the Louise Metro Station. The stylish boutiques of Avenue Louise are just around the corner.

item.title: Steigenberger Grandhotel
item.body: Reopened in 1993, the hotel has preserved its magnificent 19th century façade, giving it a unique charm. Being an elegant and luxurious hotel, the Steigenberger Grandhotel is undoubtedly the most beautiful luxury hotel in the capital. It is perfectly located for business and leisure visitors coming to the heart of Europe.Each of the 225 guestrooms and 42 suites offers the same unparalleled sense of space, comfort and modern amenities to answer your every need. Discover our 95 very quiet Superior Rooms, overlooking the inner court.All rooms feature marble bathrooms including separate bath and shower, tea and coffee making facilities and IHome docking station. For the classic and superior room, you can choose between two styles, two atmospheres that will meet your expectations.From Classic Rooms to the Royal Suite, the Grandhotel Brussels offers you the most luxurious and largest categories of rooms in the city. The Grandhotel Brussels excels at hosting business meetings and events, providing 1100 m2 function space with the largest ballroom without columns in town with the capacity to host up to 600 people. Additionally there are 10 meeting rooms for smaller events, all benefiting from natural daylight.

item.title: Martin´s Brussels EU
item.body: This design hotel features leisure facilities, a garden terrace and sound-proofed rooms only 500 metres from Schuman Metro Station. Martin's is less than a 5-minute walk from the European Commission.

item.title: Albert Hotel
item.body: Albert offers 2-star rooms with flat-screen cable TV opposite the Halles de Schaerbeek, only 600 metres from Brussels-North Railway Station.

item.title: Hotel Manos Premier
item.body: Discover The Manos Premier,a long standing Brussels establishement with luxurious guestrooms and suites,function rooms, spa, fine dining restaurant and one of the top location in Brussels This Brussels 5 star hotel has enchanted its guest for over 30 years impressing discerning travellers with a selection of 5 star accommodation options: including grand apartment suites, luxurious one bedroom suites, stylish rooms. Our gourmet restaurant provides the finest cuisine and wines in an elegant dining environment As a guest, you too will be delighted by this charming classic boutique hotel and the many pleasures it provides. Our service is second to none, and our staff and concierge team ensure your every need is met. All to ensure you receive one of the best hospitality experiences in Brussels. Our location is just off fashionable Avenue Louise and in walking distance from the city center.

item.title: Hotel Manos Stephanie
item.body: Hotel Manos Stephanie is ideally located in the heart of Brussels, just a few meters away from the most fashionable shopping and business districts such as the prestigious Place Stephanie and Avenue Louise. Our hotel is a reflection of Brussels? genuine hospitality. The lobby and corridors form a permanent exhibition of the most beautiful antiques. We provide 55 warm rooms, decorated in Louis XVI style. To enhance your enjoyment, our marble bathrooms are fully-equipped with toilet requisites, a bath robe, a hair-dryer, a shower, a bathtub and a toilet. Other amenities include air-conditioning, a mini-bar, an individual safe, a radio-clock, a telephone, a desk, cable TV and a balcony in some rooms. The Manos Stephanie is committed to providing our guests with the highest standards of care and attention, something we would not be able to provide without our dedicated team of staff. Our restaurant is located in our other hotel, called Manos Premier Hotel, which is 200 m away. Our bar is on-site. We recommend you to visit the city in your free time. Here you can find a lot of tourist attractions and spend a very nice day getting to know better our culture, history and tradition.

item.title: Brussels Marriott Hotel
item.body:
Located in the heart of historic Brussels, opposite the Bourse, the Brussels Marriott Hotel is the ideal place to experience the charm of this historic city. Positioned within a restored 19th Century building, the hotel is surrounded by exclusive young and trendy designer boutiques in Rue Antoine Dansaert, and within walking distance of most of Brussels' renowned tourist attractions including the Grand Place.
Set where an island once stood in a flowing river, this smoke-free grand city center hotel offers luxurious accommodation. Well-appointed 221 guest rooms maximise breathtaking views of downtown Brussels. Room amenities include plush bedding, a spacious work area with wireless internet access, air conditioning, cable/satellite TVs, mini-bar and in-room safe. Rooms on the Executive level enjoy complimentary internet access and have unlimited entry to the Executive Lounge, where complimentary snacks and beverages are served throughout the day.
When an occasion calls for an exceptional setting 611 m² of function space is among the finest in Brussels, with an expert event staff to handle your every need. Whether you are planning a company strategy session, an intimate cocktail party or a celebratory banquet, you always have our undivided attention and tailor-made approach.
Dining at the Midtown Bar & Grill offers a culinary journey that it not soon forgotten. Known as being one of the premier steakhouses in Brussels, the restaurant serves U.S. prime beef steaks with seasonal dishes using fresh, local Belgium ingredients. This trendy restaurant offers a fun, vibrant environment.
The Brussels Marriott Hotel is located on the renowned Rue Auguste and is ideal for a stay in the city, exploring, discovering and savouring the best Belgium has to offer.

item.title: Renaissance Brussels Hotel
item.body: Renaissance offers modern sound-proofed rooms with flat-screen cable TV and an indoor pool with fitness centre. The European Parliament and Committee of Regions are both only 5 minutes' walk away.

item.title: Marivaux Hotel
item.body: This 4-star design hotel offers rooms with a flat-screen cable TV opposite the City2 Shopping Mall, only 10 minutes' walk from Grand Place. Marivaux includes a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

item.title: Radisson BLU EU Hotel
item.body:
Radisson Blu EU Hotel, Brussels offers idyllic location Nestled in the heart of the European Union capital, this designer hotel in Brussels is adjacent to the European Parliament and Schuman area. Perfect for corporate travellers, diplomats and visitors on holiday, the Radisson Blu provides unrivalled proximity to top attractions. Guests are a mere 150 metres from the European Parliament's Visitors' Centre, and the lush Leopold Park lies just one kilometre away. Our 149 contemporary rooms and suites feature sleek design by Matteo Thun and include Free high-speed, wireless Internet. Take advantage of convenient on-site dining at Willards Restaurant, or refresh with an invigorating workout at the fitness centre. This business hotel also boasts six fully equipped meeting rooms and can accommodate events with up to 100 guests.
Enviable location 12 kilometres from the Brussels Airport at Zaventem Unique design style (Fresh, Chic or Fashion) permeates all 149 rooms and suites International and Belgian favourites at Willards Restaurant, also home to the Super Breakfast Buffet Willards Bar with light snacks and famed Belgian beers Free high-speed, wireless Internet available throughout On-site fitness centre with cardio and weight-training equipment Brussels hotel with six state-of-the-art conference rooms Video conferencing available in the Spaak event room Parking services available for meeting delegates

item.title: Scandic Grand Place
item.body: Hotel Scandic Grand Place is located 400 metres away from Grand Place Square and offers air-conditioned rooms and a brand-new gym. A generous and organic breakfast buffet is served daily.

item.title: Atlas Hotel Brussels
item.body: The Atlas Hotel Brussels (www.atlas.be) is ideally located only 650 meters from the famous Grand'Place, in the trendy Downtown fashion village "Dansaert" and has been totally renovated last summer. All the 88 guest rooms of this independant hotel are fully equipped and offer a free wifi connection. A buffet breakfast is included in our special rates, during which you will be surrounded by a real piece of history, a part of the first city wall protecting the town in the Middle Age !The reception is open 24h/24 and our multi-lingual staff is at your entire disposal to guide you during your stay.
item.address: Rue Du Vieux Marché Aux Grains, 30

item.title: Sandton Brussels Centre
item.body: “A contemporary luxury hotel in the heart of Brussels”. This is how the 4- star Sandton Brussels Centre, as recently opened in the tranquil Parochiaansstraat, can best be summed up. Situated only 70m from the Gare Central (Central Station) and the impressive St. Michael and St. Gudula Cathedral and a stone's throw away from the Grand Place, the Houses of Parliament and the European Union, your hotel is located in a central but quiet place. The location of this very first hotel in the Sandton hotel chain can, due to its presence in both the tourist and business centre of Brussels, indeed be viewed as truly hitting the mark. This brand-new 4-star luxury hotel has over 70 spacious and comfortable hotel rooms, a private underground car park, meeting rooms and an intimate lounge.

item.title: Hotel Chambord
item.body: Ideally located in the most beautiful district of Brussels called "quartier Royal", this Art Deco hotel completely renovated has 64 perfectly equipped rooms suitable for business men, residential seminars and leisure

item.title: Ramada Brussels Woluwe
item.body:
Very Easily located, instant convenience hotel, with geography exactly between the beautiful Brussels' city centre and the National Airport Zaventem. Flexible access to all major european institutions and within easy reach of the E40 motorway.
Enjoy the hospitality of a reflecting bright and spacious look. Latest WiFi (Wireless) and Fix Internet Connection technologies, Express Check-in & Check-out, Easy Business Centre, vending machine,free, Lobby Tea & Chocolate Corner (free), Warm & Welcoming Color Design.
All internet accesses free of charge for all internet corporate travellers. This elegant Hotel combines a modern setting, personal service and has all the advantages of a stylish concept while retaining a human scale.
161 Business Rooms and Executive Stylish Rooms, all equipped with today's modern comfort. Elegant Buffet Breakfast in the restaurant with 360° daylight. Public bus (to Shumann) in front of hotel. Private Garage, outside parking opportunities, free Coach Parking.

item.title: Chateau Du Lac - Martin´s Hotels
item.body:
This century-old chateau offers elegant 5-star rooms between Genval Lake and a spacious landscaped park. Chateau Du Lac boasts extensive wellness facilities and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.
Flat-screen satellite TV, air conditioning and minibar are provided in each of the sound-proofed rooms at Du Lac. They also benefit from a seating area and luxurious décor with designer features.
The centre of Leuven and Brussels is about 30 minutes' drive from Chateau Du Lac. Charleroi is 45 minutes away by car. The peaceful area around the hotel is ideal for walking and cycling. Guests can hire a bicycle on site.
An indoor swimming pool, fitness centre and tennis courts are available at the hotel. The spa and wellness centre include a sauna, solarium and a range of relaxing treatments such as massages and facials.
Genval.Les.Bains lounge and bar combines gourmet cuisine with a casual modern setting. A wide range of drinks including draught beers are available in the Kingfisher bar. Guests can choose to enjoy a hot and cold breakfast buffet with a scenic lake view each morning at Genval.Les.Bains.

item.title: Rijckendael Hotel
item.body: The Rijckendael Hotel & Restaurant enjoys a peaceful location next to the Heysel Expositionpark, the Atomium, Mini Europe and just a few minutes from Brussels city centre. The 49 rooms are all quiet, comfortable and fully equipped.Among the hotel's facilities are sauna and fitness, a free parking garage, meeting/banquet rooms for up to 50 persons, and a renowned gourmet restaurant.

item.title: ibis Brussels Expo Atomium
item.body: The ibis Brussels Expo Atomium hotel boasts a central location, 5 miles (8 km) from the town center and Brussels International Airport. It is situated opposite the main entrance to the "Brussels Expo" exhibition center, close to the Bruparck theme park, the Atomium monument, the King Baudouin Stadium and the Royal Palace of Laeken. The hotel has 81 air conditioned rooms and 1 meeting room. There is a 24-hour snack bar, a private paying outdoor car park and complementary WIFI.

item.title: Courtyard By Marriott Brussels
item.body: Beautiful public areas & 13 newly renovated meeting rooms, all with wireless high-speed Internet Perfectly located between the airport and downtown, within a mile of NATO and major business parks Business center, 191 inviting guest rooms including 3 Junior Suites, Mini Market, Zinc Bar & Brasserie and 24-hour fitness center

item.title: Van der Valk Hotel Brussels Airport
Hotel Siru
item.body: Located on the Place Rogier, the Siru hotel is only a 5 minute walk to the Brussels city center. It offers modern rooms and free wireless internet throughout the hotel. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom, a fridge and a flat-screen TV with both local and international channels. There are free toiletries provided in the bathroom. Additionally a buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast lounge. Brussels centre city offering a wide variety of restaurants is just 1 km away. The Siru hotel is located 200 metres away from the Rogier metro Station. Brussels largest shopping at Rue Neuve is just 500 metres away. The Brussels North station is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. A shuttle limousine is at your disposal for all your city excursions, airport and train station transfers, as well as for your specific site seeing requests.

item.title: Radisson Blu Royal Hotel
item.body:
Just 14 kilometres from the airport, the Radisson Blu Royal Hotel, Brussels welcomes guests with a signature art deco façade designed by famed city architect Michel Jaspers. Easily discover the best of the capital's vibrant culture, food, commerce and architecture from this city centre hotel. Brussels visitors should be sure to visit nearby Grand Place, Manneken Pis and Magritte Museum, among other attractions. Rooms and suites well-designed in their own right, award-winning restaurants and first-class facilities await enjoyment upon guests' return.
Central Station is just a three-minute walk from this Brussels hotel, providing direct access to Thalys (1'25 to Paris, 1'55 to Amsterdam) and Eurostar (1'55 to London) terminals. The 281 sophisticated guest rooms showcase varied, distinctive design and thoughtful amenities, including Free high-speed, wireless Internet access and climate control. Sea Grill Restaurant boasts two Michelin stars, and the light-filled Atrium Restaurant offers casually elegant international dining. Guests can enjoy a generous breakfast buffet at uniquely adorned PebbleWood Corner. Brussels Royal Fitness Club ensures guests need not forego healthy habits while away from home. Host up to 420 guests for impressive meetings and events in city centre Brussels.

item.title: Sandton Pillows
item.body: Sandton Pillows Brussels is a perfect base for exploring the beautiful, friendly and impressive city of Brussels. So come soak up the unique culture and attractions this city has to offer. Isn't this what you've been looking for?With 45 luxurious rooms and all modern facilities, Sandton Pillows Brussels is one of the most charming hotels in Brussels. This hotel is small-scale and personal and is housed in a fully renovated, stately and characteristic building. The modern hotel makes a grand first impression. The warm décor and rich interior seamlessly connect with the look and atmosphere of this beautiful building. Free WiFi !

item.title: Vesta International
item.body: The word Vest come from the Roman Goddess of Home, Hearth and Fire, each symbolizing a core value of Vest Hotels & Resorts. Home symbolizes an environment of peace and tranquility; Hearth and Fire symbolize warmth.

item.title: Alliance Brussels Expo
item.body:
Ideally located for visiting Brussels Expo, this 3-star hotel is surrounded by green scenery and has easy access to the main motorways.
The Atomium monument, a popular Belgian tourist attraction, is close by. The hotel benefits from a direct Metro line that takes you to the heart of Brussels in only 15 minutes.
The hotel has one restaurant, where you can enjoy traditional European cuisine, or relax with a drink in the bar with terrace.

item.title: Motel One
item.body: It does not matter if you plan a long or a short trip to Brussels; your Motel One provides you with the ideal base for the varied exploits. Explore the charme of this wonderful and international city on foot. Within no time at all you can get to the Cathedral St Michael, the Old Town Hall and the winding Beenhouwersstraat.

item.title: ibis Styles Brussels Louise
item.body: The ibis Styles Brussels Louise is a stylish hotel (designs by Belgian artists) located on Avenue Louise, close to the conference center and just a few steps from the Place du Chatelain, in a charming district perfect for pleasant strolls and sampling themany restaurants. The hotel offers comfortable rooms with new innovative ibis bedding, bar, free WIFI and a private car park. It is ideal for both business travelers and tourists. Easy access from the Gare du Midi (Eurostar-Thalys) and Brussels Airport.

item.title: Max Hotel
item.body:
Maxhotel offers 63 one star brand new rooms in a modern fully redesigned 9 floors building located on one of the most important boulevard crossing the centre of Brussels . Our vision is to provide you the best value for money hotel in town. To achieve this goal we have fashioned this new concept of hotel. Maxhotel is a 1*hotel. Who cares?! Being a low cost hotel doesn't mean offering a low cost environment. All our rooms are brand new, very shiny, non-smoking, equipped with flat screen tv and WIFI connection, individual air-conditioning and private bathroom. No more front desk agent. Who cares?! Interactive high tech kiosks will facilitate your check in and out. They will provide your room key and deliver your incoming messages. If really needed, the Maxhotel's staff will always be there to answer your needs. No more breakfast room. Who cares?! You will be able to enjoy at any time our cosy lounge area equipped with vending machines offering a large assortment of food (sandwiches, Danish pastries, snacks,...), beverages (hot, soft and alcoholic drinks), amenities and services that will undoubtedly please you. No more wasteful amenities. Who cares?!
You will find everything you need such as toiletries & other services at very fair rate.

item.title: Alma Grand Place Hotel
item.body:
At the heart of Brussels! Situated in the historic centre of Brussels, Hotel Alma is 5 minutes' walk away from the Gare Centrale and public transport (tram, bus, metro). This makes it very easy for you to get to the heart of the European quarter or to the Atomium. Just leave Hotel Alma to find your happiness, whatever it may be: a nice little café or a Michelin starred restaurant, trendy bars and old bistros, Belgian beers, exhibitions, stately homes and quarters. Even if you're on a tight schedule, you'll have time to see all the sights that can't be missed: our Grand Place, so beautiful it will take your breath away (+/- 200m away), Manneken Pis (+/- 500m), Brussels' most international "Kets" and the superb Galeries Royales Saint-Hubert (+/- 500m away). Just a few steps away there is also the museum quarter and the Sablon, a square full of trendy bars, exclusive boutiques and experts in everything from chocolate to antiques. 37 rooms. No-Smoker rooms. Air-conditioning. LED flat screen TV. Safe. Free internet in the lobby. Centrally located. Metro, bus and train within walking distance of the hotel. A few steps from the Grand Place and the shopping streets.
Public parking at 50 meters.

item.title: Hotel Lambeau
item.body: A family run, Brussels hotel enjoying a privileged location in a classy, quiet and green residential area very near a variety of shops and restaurants. Not far from the European district (Schuman) and a 5-minutes drive from NATO, the hotel is connected directly to the city centre both by car and public transport (Tramway - Metro - Bus). There are also easy, direct connections to Brussels' Airport, train stations, main tourist sights and political and economic centres. Hotel Lambeau is open 24h/24 throughout the year. Outdoor free parking available. The hotel does not have a restaurant but there are many restaurants nearby providing cuisine for all tastes. Non smoking hotel. Free WiFi.

item.title: Aqua Hotel Brussels
item.body: Located in the trendy Louise/Toison d'Or area, close to the historical centre and the European Institutions, our brand new hotel combines up-to-date comfort and a welcoming atmosphere. A surprise already awaits you in our entrance: the latest creation of “Studio Arne Quinze”.

item.title: Adagio Access Brussels Europe
item.body: Our 110 units aparhotel located in the European District proposes studios for 2 persons and studios for 4 persons. A small kitchen with possibility to cook and warm some food is available in all units, as well as free Wifi in all the residence. Our reception staff available 24h will be pleased to welcome and give you some information during your stay. We also propose a 24h laundry room (paying), breakfast room (breakfast not included). At 150 meters, metro station "Trône" is close to move easily in Brussels and the Grand - Place is at 15 minutes walking distance.

item.title: Hotel The Neufchatel
item.body: This characteristic Boutique Hotel decorated by the interior designer Manuel Vraux de S. Laranjeiro provides a homely residence located a 5-minute walk from the trendy Avenue Louise. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. The Neufchatel offers elegant guest rooms provided with quality furniture and a private bathroom with a rain shower. The rooms have an LED TV offering more than 40 international channels. A buffet breakfast is served daily and the hotel is near several restaurants, cafés, and shops. Located 800 metres from the Louise Metro Station and 50 metres from the Janson Tramway Stop (Trams 81 and 92), guests can easily reach the Grand-Place and its Manneken-Pis, the Atomium, the European Parliament and the BruExpo Exhibition Centre. The Brussels Midi Train Station (where the TGV, Eurostar and Ryanair Shuttle stop) is 3 metro stations away from The Neufchatel.

item.title: Sheraton Brussels Airport Hotel & Conference Center
